p: FAS has been proposed as a potential therapeutic target for the treatment of obesity ( 54, 57), and grape skin extract and resveratrol have shown FAS enzyme-inhibiting properties. In 3T3-L1 pre-adipocytes, resveratrol reduced lipid accumulation ( 58). Furthermore, resveratrol treatment decreased the epididymal adipose tissue Fasn mRNA expression in high fat diet-fed mice ( 59). FAS inhibition is followed by malonyl-CoA, acetyl-CoA and NADPH accumulation, which is interpreted by the cell as a signal for abundance of energy ( 58).
